overview: Lonely gay boy Jamie finds himself in need of some companionship. He thrusts himself into the world of online gay dating apps and hook up culture in search of... something? A mysterious profile named GB catches Jamieâ€™s eye and after a brief exchange of texts the two boys decide to meet. They both hit it off immediately and in the blink of an eye they begin to start their lives together. What started off as a simple fling could possibly turn into the greatest love story of all time... or at least for the next week.
title: A 21st Century Gay Love Story
